WRITING.TITLE: Need help for school newspaper
WRITING.TEXT:
I'm writing an article for my school's newspaper about cryptids and I was wondering if you guys would answer a couple questions for me. Any and all help is appreciated! Questions: - How would you define a cryptid? - What makes you believe in cryptids or at least have some form of belief? - What are the most common cryptids that you hear about? - Have you ever had any sort of encounter with a cryptid? - Which cryptid do you believe to be most credible and why? -How does the rest of the scientific community view cryptozoology?
Thanks so much guys!
Fuck yeah, dat pokemonz
Agreed
I work at McDonald's and the same thing happened. I did super awesome at things I normally suck at. Not to mention it was a lot easier to talk to strangers all day :)
It sounds like a changeling perhaps. They are known to steal babies and children as well as change their appearance. I think that's the right name for the creature I'm thinking.
Same here. I can sense spirits as well, and often receive thoughts and visions from them.
Unfortunately I have schizophrenia and this sounds like something I used to experience often before I was put on medication. Maybe look into getting that checked out?
It looks like its gonna explode. So cute though :)

Thank you :) I'm 16
I've been all over the place, think my meds have stopped working. I gained a pound. I'm okay for now though. Thank you for asking. Tomorrows my birthday :)
Wow! You look really good! That 20lbs really made a difference. Keep it up
Congratulations! Your ring is beautiful :)
I'm positive.

Well, he's been like that here recently due to an ear infection. But he's done the sassy head tilt thing when i talk to him since he was a baby. This was one of those times. His head tilt isn't as severe as it appears in the pic. That tilt, is simply enormous amounts of sass.

He has an incredible amount of sass for such a small animal, so I'm sure he was thinking something along those lines.
